For an express trip into the future, climb aboard Hyperloop One,...
...cutting a path through a hypothetical desert at 700 miles per hour.
The whole Hyperloop concept is the brainchild of billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk...
...whose Boring Company, that's the name, just finished digging a tunnel in Los Angeles,...
...convinced vacuum tube Hyperloops could someday move cars to high-speed underground sleds.
He's already run tests at 125 miles per hour...
...and in a recent TED talk, discussed building loops in Los Angeles,...
